doc.title: 10 O'Clock
doc.plot: Asha lives a wealthy lifestyle along with her widower dad, Shyamrao Dhaneshwar, studies in an arts college, and adores the college's most brilliant yet poor student, Ashok Deshmukh. Both continue to meet every week at 10 O' Clock at night, and he even introduces her to his family, which consists of his widowed mother and younger sister, Usha. Asha will soon realize that being wealthy does have it's disadvantages when she will be forbidden to see Ashok anymore and must obey her dad's wishes and get married to equally wealthy Dr. Ramesh.

Both continue to meet every week at 10 O' Clock at night, and he even introduces her to his family, which consists of his widowed mother and younger sister, Usha. Asha will soon realize that being wealthy does have it's disadvantages when she will be forbidden to see Ashok anymore and must obey her dad's wishes and get married to equally wealthy Dr. Ramesh.
